skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Eagle Union Battleship Georgia. My main guns are bigger than those of my distant cousins. Yes indeedy, these guns of mine take all the bad guys in front of me... and blast 'em all to hell!
skins.acquisition: I am Georgia from the Eagle Union. Fear not, for my cannons shall bring victory in your name.
skins.login: Oh, perfect timing. I just finished warming up. Time to exercise? Or sortie?
skins.details: It's a good idea to look over your weapons and keep it all working. You want to help?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I have a dream. A dream where the seas are free of the stink of gunpowder, and all the people of the world live in peace.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Cola sure is the best drink, isn't it? Oh, but you can't drink Oxy-cola, Commander...
skins.secretaryIdle3: If I had the chance, I'd love to travel all around the world. The Sakura Empire, the Dragon Empery, the Royal Navy... Hmm, some kind of world tour sounds nice, doesn't it?
skins.secretaryTouch: Oooh? You find my guns so appealing, Commander? Enjoy them to your heart's content~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oooh? Hey Commander, did you want me to use you for target practice...?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: GEORGIA BEEAAAAM! ... Just playing around! Hahaha!

skins.shipDescription: Oh? Commander, did you need to get some fresh air as well? Me? Ahaha... It's a bit too stiff inside that venue, so I came out for a change of pace. Why don't we take a little stroll together?
skins.acquisition: Oh? Commander, did you need to get some fresh air as well? Me? Ahaha... It's a bit too stiff inside that venue, so I came out for a change of pace. Why don't we take a little stroll together?
skins.login: It's so much easier to relax when we're alone... Don't you think, Commander?
skins.details: My dress? Oh, Seattle helped me with it. We all know I couldn't get it looking like this myself...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Whew, now this is a fine place to enjoy a cola. You want one, Commander? I brought extra.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Don't you have to hurry back to the party, Commander? Lots of girls waiting for you, no?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Don't worry about it, Commander. I love the fleet. I'll head back inside in a bit.
skins.secretaryTouch: Woah!! That was close... Thanks, Commander. Getting around in high heels isn't exactly my forte.

skins.shipDescription: Heh heh, the warm sun and the sea breeze really hit the spot, don't they? Alright, let's get out there and enjoy ourselves! That's what you've been waiting for, right, Commander?
skins.acquisition: Heh heh, the warm sun and the sea breeze really hit the spot, don't they? Alright, let's get out there and enjoy ourselves! That's what you've been waiting for, right, Commander?
skins.login: Ooh, you're just in time. Commander, mind helping me set up this parasol?
skins.details: Seattle picked out this lace coverup for me. She's good with this kind of thing...
skins.secretaryIdle1: What do you think of my sunglasses? I dig them, personally. Hahaha!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Nothing beats an ice cold Oxy Cola on a summer day! Here, take one, Commander... Oh right, you can't drink these. This one's for you.
skins.secretaryIdle3: We've still got some summer left, so why not try to plan a "Beach World Tour" for us?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, it's really funny watching you try to figure out where it's safe to look. Hahaha!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ah haah? Commander, you've really gotten into the spirit of the beach now. Maybe I should give you a bit more "stimulation." Like a whooping with this parasol, for instance.

skins.shipDescription: Happy New Year, Commander! I guess you dress up all flashy like this for the Sakura New Year. Would you escort me...? What are you gawking like that for...? Haha, am I so dazzling? Hahaha!
skins.acquisition: Happy New Year, Commander! I guess you dress up all flashy like this for the Sakura New Year. Would you escort me...? What are you gawking like that for...? Haha, am I so dazzling? Hahaha!
skins.login: And just where are you escorting me today? I'm dying to find out.
skins.details: The Sakura Empire's tea is good stuff! But I still feel like I want an Oxy-cola sometimes... Huh? It wouldn't look right? I can't help it if I want one.
skins.secretaryIdle1: So this "Momotarou" pops out of a peach! What an amazing little guy!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Seattle, I got an invite to this party or something. Any idea for a talent show? It has to be something better than the "Georgia Beam"!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, I just finished my new drink - mixi
skins.secretaryTouch: Ready to be a proper escort?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey now, you're going to mess up my outfit.
